column4: 5.1 sound when playing dvd? or are you trying to upmix stereo file to 5.1? at home i have p8 too and have no prob getting 5.1 sound, it's out of the box.
all I can do is stereo... if I try to select 5.1 no sounds from any channel. I have not tried from a dvd yet, just file playback
my reading led me to believe this was a common and known issue
did sound volume icon looks mute? also try to install pavumeter you can configure per channel volume from there.
ill give that a shot, thanks
